content.question:
Respond to parts A, B, C, and D.

Describe democratization.

Describe an electoral measure that a country could use to become more democratic.

Explain how a policy could help a country address political inequality.

Explain why an authoritarian regime would resist citizen participation in the policy-making process.

frqParts.text:
Respond to parts A, B, C, and D.

Describe democratization.

Describe an electoral measure that a country could use to become more democratic.

Explain how a policy could help a country address political inequality.

Explain why an authoritarian regime would resist citizen participation in the policy-making process.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
